_header: Lief in thy rock ne is no thief
Note:
There are other English tags in Bozon’s sermons in this and other MSS, e.g. London, British Library Harley 1288; printed in Smith (1889)
XSmith, Lucy Toulmin. Les contes moralisés de Nicole Bozon.
Societe des anciens textes francais 50. Paris: Firmin Didot, 1889, 12, 20, 44, 145, 151.
_description: A couplet in Nicolas Bozon’s Contes moraliseés — On a spinner, in a sermon by Nicholas Bozon

GraysInn12.Transcription:
Leve in þi rokke ne is no theftake oþer mannez wulle is
                    hire to lef
GraysInn12.Note:
Written as prose, lines 6-5 from the bottom. The phrase ‘Leue in
                    þi rokke’ also appears 9 lines from the bottom.
